rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with ample natural light and reception area in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open living space with a central area for family gatherings; designed with Brutalist aesthetics using raw concrete finishes.
Modern dining area adjoining the living room; includes exposed structural elements in line with the Brutalist design.
Functional kitchen space with a working triangle and raw concrete surfaces, ensuring efficient workflow.
Small guest bathroom adjacent to the living area; utilitarian design with minimal finishes.
